extendedInfo.description: Published by HIT - "It's a Fine Line" aims to reduce risk-taking behaviour associated with cocaine use among young people aged 16 and over. The app provides harm reduction information on physical health, emergency action, mental health, debt, relationships, sexual health and compulsion. Practical tips about controlling cocaine use are also provided.HIT was established in 1985 to reduce drug-related harm and set up one of the worldâs first HIV prevention projects for people who use drugs. It is one of the leading agencies in the world dealing with education, information and training about legal and illegal drugs.

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work, even after re-installation.
